channel.title: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?
channel.description: What sounds and drum kits do you use? Custom kits? Do you layer the sweeper effect over a bass for a crashing boom? What have you done that you think others should be doing as well?

item.title: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?

item.description:
Glad I could be of some help then.

item.title: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?
item.dc:creator: Alone_in_Rome
item.description:
I like what you’ve linked. I’m not goin for as high bpm’s but looking at what instruments you use and the changes you put on the bass in terms of altering lowpass and highpass are good inspirations for me! Thanks for your help!

Read full topic
item.source: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?

item.title: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
Dubstep and trance are difficult to mox but i can see it being done. definetly a dificult combo. Make the verses trance and the drops dubstep. for growls just automate pitch and highpass on a bass that has a long sustain. i use cube a lot

Read full topic
item.source: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?

item.title: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Do u have an example of someone else’s work you’re trying to emulate?
I got a picture, but still not exactly crystal clear.

Tell me if this old project is anything close to what you have in mind. I think It’s more of PsyTrance (at least that’s what I was trying to do), but maybe it’s similar to what u have in mind.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/Pe5p3F2Lvl7FrSiEnCgdZQ==

Read full topic
item.source: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?

item.title: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?
item.dc:creator: Alone_in_Rome
item.description:
lol by dark trance I mean still dubstep but less high pitched synths and lower bpm. Still bass and drums galore, but the focus would be on the melody of the bass rather than using the bass as a supplement to the synths

Read full topic

item.title: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?

item.description:
Dubstep + Trance??? No clue. Maybe PsyTrance I guess. Go look up Infected Mushroom.

item.title: Advice for a dubstep/dark trance song?
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Um, I dont know how Dubstep can be with Trance.

Dubstep is big, loud, and kinda just in your face.
Trance is beautiful, uplifting, and just a good feeling.
